title: Office Tab Enterprise 10.00 Multilanguage + Crack - AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

Office Tab Enterprise a new version of a small but very useful utility. The principle of Office Tab is relatively simple, but no less effective - the windows open documents are displayed in the interface of Office applications as tabs open pages in modern browsers. Utility Office Tab eliminates one of the few drawbacks of the package Microsoft Office - the lack of an intuitive tool for working with a large number of public documents. Although the company Opera Software has implemented a mechanism of tabs in your browser for a long time, Microsoft has implemented a similar approach only in the browser Internet Explorer, but not in other applications. Part of the problem of dealing with multiple open documents is now decides improved interface environment of Windows 7, but the utility Office Tab eliminates this deficiency in the root - each application of a series of Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, Access, Project, and Visio) gets its own set of tabs for all open documents.

Features :

Save all files in one click. Office Tab key advantage is that you can save time by consolidating your actions! For example, if you open multiple files in order to save them, you do not need to save and close them individually, just click the "Save All" from the context menu, and all your files are stored. Do you want to close all open files? Just select "Close all" and all your files will be closed.
Document Management Group. The Office Tab, you can add the saved file in the Microsoft Office group. You can quickly open a group of documents, such as a group of files Excel.
Easily rename files. You can not open the dialog box "Save as" to rename the file. Just click the "Rename" from the context menu tab and enter a new file name. If you want to save the file to another folder, select the "Save As" from the context menu.
Displays the full name of the file. If the file name is long, usually Windows taskbar shows only a small part of what is often a problem. However, with installed Office Tab, you will be able to see the full file name on the tab, no matter how long it is.
Functional context menu. Right-click the tab or the tab bar for accessing the context menu of the tab. Office Tab also combines some elements in common commands Microsoft Office, which allows faster access to these commands.
Easy to use. Tabbed interface allows you to open multiple documents in one window. Description taken from swer.ws. Each document appears in a new tab in the same window (not a new window) and all of these documents are available with one click. This feature improves your efficiency when working with programs Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Project, Publisher, Access and Visio).
Low resource consumption. Office Tab is based on a standard package Microsoft Office Add-In Technology. Therefore, Office Tab does not affect the performance of the standard Microsoft Office.
Moving tabs. Tabs can be easily moved using drag and drop. You can switch between the tabs using the mouse or tab by pressing Alt + N (N is the number of tabs (1, 2, 3, etc.)).
Personalize tab. The colors of tabs and the tab bar can be customized. It offers 11 styles to choose from.

What's New :

New Features:
Supporting Microsoft Office 2016.
Add new shortcuts (Ctrl + Shift + Tab) to switch tabs backward.
Add the New in New Window feature to the right-click menu: you can quickly create a new file in a separated new window in Microsoft Office 2013 or above version.
Add the Open in New Window feature to the right-click menu: you can quickly open the file (save-already) in another new window in Microsoft Office 2013 or above version.
Support single window mode in Microsoft Office 2013 and 2016 while multiple files are opened.
Improvements:
Optimizing tab bar position: making left workspace and right workspace compatible with Kutools for Excel's Navigation Pane.
Optimizing some default setting options.
Fixed: some minor bugs.

System Requirements :

Windows XP
Vista (32/64)
Windows 8 / 8.1 (32/64)
Windows 7 (32/64)
Windows Server 2003 and 2008.
Visual C ++ 2012 (x86 / x64)

Supported versions of Microsoft Office: 2003, 2007, 2010, 2013 and 2016

Notes :

Rename the file C:  Program Files  Detong  Office Tab  OfficeTabLoader.dll in OfficeTabLoader1.dll
Rename the file C:  Program Files  Detong  Office Tab  OfficeTabLoader64.dll in OfficeTabLoader2.dll
Copy the two .dll files in the folder "fix OTE 10 x64_x86" in the C:  Program Files  Detong  Office Tab
